price: Kuma idan aka saukar da wata sũra cẽwa; Ku yi ĩmãni da Allah kuma ku yi jihãdi tãre da ManzionSa. Sai mawadãta daga gare su su nẽmi izninka, kuma su ce: Ka bar mu mu kasance tãre da mazauna.
arabic: وَإِذَآ أُنزِلَتۡ سُورَةٌ أَنۡ ءَامِنُواْ بِٱللَّهِ وَجَٰهِدُواْ مَعَ رَسُولِهِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡذَنَكَ أُوْلُواْ ٱلطَّوۡلِ مِنۡهُمۡ وَقَالُواْ ذَرۡنَا نَكُن مَّعَ ٱلۡقَٰعِدِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā unzilat sūratun an āminū bil-lahi wajāhidū maʿa rasūlihi is'tadhanaka ulū al-ṭawli min'hum waqālū dharnā nakun maʿa al-qāʿidīna
